title: Beyond 9-to-5: A Generative Model for Augmenting Mobility Data of Underrepresented Shift Workers
summary: This paper addresses the underrepresentation of shift workers in urban mobility modeling by proposing a generative model to augment their mobility data. It highlights differences between GPS and survey data for shift workers, focusing on temporal patterns.
usefulness_reason: The paper directly addresses "urban mobility modeling" and "temporal patterns", indicating a "Spatio Temporal" aspect. It also explicitly uses and compares "GPS and survey data", making it highly relevant to "Survey data". The focus on underrepresented shift workers also implies a "Contextual dataset".
